list-item.p: There are several freely accessible internet data streams available to supplement traditional sentinel surveillance vector-borne viruses, parasites, and other pathogens, including ZIKV, DENV, other arboviruses, and malaria.
The accuracy of these internet-based VBD surveillance systems varies. Spatial and temporal scale, disease burden, and seasonality are likely strong predictors of accuracy.
User-friendly free platforms that combine digital and nondigital data streams to enhance VBD surveillance are now available for clinical and public health use.
